customLabels.label: Map Account record types to the Primary Affiliation fields on Contacts to define how updates to those fields impact Affiliation records and how updates to Affiliation records impact Contact records.
customLabels.name: AfflMappingsDescription

customLabels.label: If an Affiliation is related to only one Program Enrolment and that Program Enrolment is deleted, also delete the Affiliation. If you don't enable this setting, select a Status for Affiliations Not Deleted.
customLabels.name: AfflProgEnrollDeleted

customLabels.label: Specify a Course Connection that has the same Contact as you specified for this Attendance Event.

customLabels.label: We couldn't run the Apex job.
customLabels.name: BatchJobRunningProblem

customLabels.label: Set the Filter field, or both the Filter field and Filter value.
customLabels.name: BothFieldAndValue

customLabels.label: Can't change the Contact or Course Offering on a Course Connection that has associated Term Grades or Attendance Events. If you want a Course Connection with a different Contact or Course Offering, create a new Course Connection.
customLabels.name: CannotChangeContactAndCourseOffering

customLabels.label: This record can't be deleted because it has one or more related records associated with it. Delete the associated records first, then delete this record. To determine which records should be deleted first, click the Related tab. If you don't see related records, or if you're unable to delete them, contact your System Administrator for assistance.
customLabels.name: CannotDelete

customLabels.label: The field entered as the Filter Field isn't valid. Filter Fields can be any standard or custom field on the object this trigger is for, as well as fields on related records. Make sure you use the field's API name, and omit any EDA namespace prefix ("hed__").
customLabels.name: InvalidFilter

customLabels.label: More than one Course Connection is associated with this Contact and this Course Offering. Specify the Course Connection that represents the student's enrolment in this Course Offering for this Term Grade.
customLabels.name: MultipleCourseConnection

customLabels.label: The Contact and Course Offering are not specified or don't match the Course Connection. Either specify only a Course Connection or both a Contact and a Course Offering, so we can save this record with the correct data.
customLabels.name: NoContactCOFound

customLabels.label: There is no Course Connection associated with this Contact and Course Offering. If this student is enrolled in this Course Offering, create a Course Connection.
customLabels.name: NoCourseConnection

customLabels.label: The Contact and Course Offering don't match the Course Connection. Either specify only a Course Connection or both a Contact and a Course Offering, so we can save this record with the correct data.
customLabels.name: NoDataMatch

customLabels.label: Either specify only a Course Connection or both a Contact and a Course Offering.
customLabels.name: NoFieldsPopulated

customLabels.label: There is no Contact or Course Offering associated with this Course Connection. Choose a valid Course Connection.
customLabels.name: OnlyCourseConnectionPopulated

customLabels.label: We can't find the email specified in Preferred Email. Make sure that you're entering the field label of an existing custom email field.
customLabels.name: PreferredEmailMatchMustExist

customLabels.label: The email field you selected in Preferred Email is blank. Either choose a different Preferred Email, or add a value for that email field.
customLabels.name: PreferredEmailMatchNotNull

customLabels.label: Select a value for Preferred Email.

customLabels.label: We can't find the Phone specified in Preferred Phone. Make sure that you're entering the field label of an existing custom Phone field.
customLabels.name: PreferredPhoneMatchMustExist

customLabels.label: The phone selected for Preferred Phone can't be blank.
customLabels.name: PreferredPhoneMatchNotNull

customLabels.label: Select a value for Preferred Phone.

customLabels.label: Auto-Create settings let you define when a Relationship record is automatically created between a Contact and a Campaign Member, based on a custom lookup field on one of the two objects. For example, a 'Referral' lookup from Campaign Member to Contact could create a 'Referrer' and 'Referee' Relationship between the two Contacts. (Note that this feature is not available for Leads or Campaign Member objects that reference Leads.)
customLabels.name: RelationshipsAutoDescription

customLabels.label: Configure matching relationships so you can understand how a Contact is related to another from either Contact record.
customLabels.name: RelationshipsLookupDescription

customLabels.label: Invalid call. This function is reserved for Salesforce use.
customLabels.name: adapterException

customLabels.label: Address records can only be associated with Accounts or Contacts.
customLabels.name: addrHhAdmAccountOnly

customLabels.label: The ability to add multiple addresses is disabled for this Account record type. To enable it, go to EDA Settings, click on Accounts and Contacts, and select the appropriate checkbox next to Account Types with Multi-Addresses Enabled.
customLabels.name: addrNotEnabledAccount

customLabels.label: The ability to add multiple addresses is disabled for Contacts. To enable it, go to EDA Settings, click on Accounts and Contacts, then select the Contact Multi-Addresses Enabled checkbox.
customLabels.name: addrNotEnabledContact

customLabels.label: There's an existing Address record for this Account or Contact with seasonal start and end dates that overlap the seasonal dates for this record. Adjust the seasonal dates so that they don't overlap with the other Address record.
customLabels.name: addrSeasonalOverlap

customLabels.label: An address can't have partial Seasonal Start and End Dates. Either enter values for all of the Seasonal Start and End date fields, or leave all of them blank.

customLabels.name: addrSeasonalPartialYear

customLabels.label: The Filter Field value names a duplicate of a product field. Specify a non-duplicate field. Otherwise, we filter using the value in the product field. If you choose the latter option, acknowledge that you accept this filtering logic by appending {0} after the field name. For example, if the duplicate field is Deceased__c, enter Deceased__c{0} as the Filter Field value.
customLabels.name: duplicateWithHEDAField

customLabels.label: A blank required field is preventing this record from being saved. The required field could be on this record, or on a record related by a lookup value.

customLabels.label: We can't save this record because {1} isn't a valid Account record type. Ask your admin to check Affiliation Mappings in EDA Settings and set the value for {0} to the API name of a valid Account record type instead of {1}.

customLabels.label: Plan Requirements can specify either a Program Plan or a parent Plan Requirement, but not both. customLabels.label: If selected, set the new Affiliation's role to the value defined in Role for Created Affiliations. Otherwise, leave the Affiliation's role blank.
customLabels.name: stgHelpAfflProgEnrollSetRole

customLabels.label: Select a role for Affiliations created with Program Enrolments.
customLabels.name: stgHelpAfflProgEnrollSetRoleValue

customLabels.label: Select a status for Affiliations created with Program Enrolments.
customLabels.name: stgHelpAfflProgEnrollSetStatusValue

customLabels.label: Allow Contacts to have multiple Address records.
customLabels.name: stgHelpContactAddrs

customLabels.label: Require Contacts to have a Preferred Email.
customLabels.name: stgHelpContactPreferredEmail

customLabels.label: Require Contacts to have a Preferred Phone.
customLabels.name: stgHelpContactPreferredPhone

customLabels.label: Copy the Contact's Preferred Phone to their Phone field.
customLabels.name: stgHelpContactPreferredPhoneSync

customLabels.label: We're updating the Extended Description field. Look for an email when the job is done.
customLabels.name: stgHelpCopyQueuedEmailSent

customLabels.label: Changes Faculty Course Connection records to the Default Faculty Record Type value, and all other Course Connection records to the Default Student Record Type value.
customLabels.name: stgHelpCourseConnBackfillDescription

customLabels.label: Before enabling Course Connections for the first time, run this Apex job to update Faculty Course Connection records to the Default Faculty Record Type value. Also updates remaining Course Connections to the Default Student Record Type value.
customLabels.name: stgHelpCourseConnectionBackfill

customLabels.label: Copies text from the Description field on Course records to the Extended Description field to accommodate longer course descriptions.
customLabels.name: stgHelpCoursesDataMigration

customLabels.label: This utility copies values from the Course Description field to the Extended Description field. This process may take some time, but you can safely close this page and the process will continue in the background.
customLabels.name: stgHelpCoursesDataMigrationCopiesValues

customLabels.label: If a Course already has a value for Extended Description, we don't overwrite it.
customLabels.name: stgHelpCoursesDataMigrationDontOverwrite

customLabels.label: After the process is complete, remember to update page layouts and other areas of the application that refer to the Description fields.
customLabels.name: stgHelpCoursesDataMigrationUpdatePageLayouts

customLabels.label: The Fluency value set when changing or setting a Contact's Primary Language on a Contact Language record.
customLabels.name: stgHelpDefaultContactLanguageFluency

customLabels.label: Select the record type for faculty Course Connections.
customLabels.name: stgHelpDefaultFacultyType

customLabels.label: Select the record type for student Course Connections.
customLabels.name: stgHelpDefaultStudentType

customLabels.label: You must enable Course Connections before running the Course Connections Backfill.
customLabels.name: stgHelpEnableCourseConnBeforeBackfill

customLabels.label: You must enable Course Connections before editing record types.
customLabels.name: stgHelpEnableCourseConnBeforeRecordTypes

customLabels.label: Require that Course Connection records specify whether they're for faculty or students. If you turn on this setting, also set the Default Student Record Type and Default Faculty Record Type.</br></br>Before enabling this setting for the first time, run the Legacy Course Enrolment Data Apex job in System Tools.
customLabels.name: stgHelpEnableCourseConnections

customLabels.label: For existing Contacts who haven't specified a Preferred Email or Preferred Phone, the cleanup ensures that one of the Contact's standard or custom email addresses or phone numbers are set as the preferred value.
customLabels.name: stgHelpEnsureExistContactPreferEmail

customLabels.label: Allow error handling for asynchronous jobs to make it easier to see when scheduled jobs fail.
customLabels.name: stgHelpErrorDisable

customLabels.label: Send error notifications to selected recipients. If you choose Chatter Group or User, also specify a value in Error Notification Recipients.
customLabels.name: stgHelpErrorNotifyOn

customLabels.label: Enter a single user name or Chatter group. Users are notified of errors by email, Chatter groups are notified with a post to the feed.
customLabels.name: stgHelpErrorNotifyTo

customLabels.label: If you used the Ethnicity field before EDA version 1.28, this Apex job updates the Race field on Contacts with a copy of standard and custom values from the Ethnicity field. The values Not Hispanic or Latino and Hispanic or Latino aren't copied.
customLabels.name: stgHelpEthnicityRaceBackfill

customLabels.label: Enables Address management for Administrative and Household Accounts when selected.
customLabels.name: stgHelpHouseAdmAccountAddressMgmt

customLabels.label: The Account record type used for Household Accounts.
customLabels.name: stgHelpHouseholdRecType

customLabels.label: If your org previously added custom picklist values to the Ethnicity field that you want to be available in the Race field, copy those custom picklist values to the Race field.
customLabels.name: stgHelpIfCustomValuesEthnicityCopyRace

customLabels.label: If you have a hierarchy for nested Plan Requirements, specifying that they can have only a Program Plan or only a parent Plan Requirement can help maintain your structure.
customLabels.name: stgHelpNestedPlanRequirementPP

customLabels.label: Enables Address management for Organisational Accounts when selected.
customLabels.name: stgHelpOrgAccountAddressMgmt

customLabels.label: Auto-created Relationships are deduplicated by default to prevent duplicate Relationship records from being created between two Contacts. Select "Allow Auto-Created Duplicate Relations" to disable this behaviour and allow multiple Relationships of the same type between two Contacts.
customLabels.name: stgHelpRelAutoCreatedDup

customLabels.label: Specify how to populate the Type field on automatically created Reciprocal Relationships. Select List Setting to use the values from the Reciprocal Relationships. Select Value Inversion to invert the Type on the original Relationship record.
customLabels.name: stgHelpRelReciprocalMethod

customLabels.label: Remove all picklist values from the Ethnicity field except for "Hispanic or Latino" and "Not Hispanic or Latino." We recommend that you replace each removed value with one of the remaining valid values, rather than deleting them outright from existing records. As of EDA version 1.28, the only valid Ethnicity values are "Not Hispanic or Latino" and "Hispanic or Latino."
customLabels.name: stgHelpRemoveAllPicklistValuesEthnicityExceptHispanicOrLatino

customLabels.label: For simple address changes to Contacts or Accounts, update existing Address records rather than creating new ones.
customLabels.name: stgHelpSimpleAddrChangeIsUpdate

customLabels.label: Log and store errors on the Error object. After this setting is enabled, create a tab for the Error object to view error records.
customLabels.name: stgHelpStoreErrorsOn

customLabels.label: If you had reports or formula fields that referenced the previous values in the Ethnicity field, update them.
customLabels.name: stgHelpUpdateReportIfDependenciesEthnicity

customLabels.label: When Leads are converted, automatically rename Accounts to use the account naming format associated with these selected record types.
customLabels.name: stgLeadConversionAccountNamingDesc

customLabels.label: The batch Apex job processed {0} records with {1} failures.
customLabels.name: stgPreferredEmailBatchEmailBody

customLabels.label: Preferred Email/Phone Job completed with a status of:
customLabels.name: stgPreferredEmailBatchEmailSubject

customLabels.label: Refreshes Preferred Email and Preferred Phone fields for all Contacts as specified by your org's related settings. Before proceeding, make sure you've disabled any processes that reference Preferred Email and Preferred Phone fields.

customLabels.label: Update Preferred Email and Phone fields?
customLabels.name: stgPreferredPhoneEmailModalTitle

customLabels.label: We're updating the Preferred Email and Preferred Phone fields. Look for an email when the job is done.
customLabels.name: stgPreferredPhoneEmailSuccessToast

customLabels.label: Select a field for Preferred Phone to copy the value from when the standard Phone field has no value, or more than one 'Phone' field is defined.
customLabels.name: stgPreferredPhoneSelection

customLabels.label: The field to use for Preferred Phone when the Phone field is blank, or more than one phone value is defined.
customLabels.name: stgPreferredPhoneSelectionDesc

customLabels.label: This Reciprocal Relationship maps the {0} reciprocal value to the {1} {2}, and {3} reciprocal values. We're just making sure that you want to delete it.
customLabels.name: stgReciprocalRelDeleteModalBody

customLabels.name: stgReciprocalRelEditModalBody

customLabels.label: Select the Reciprocal Relationship type to create.
customLabels.name: stgReciprocalRelNewModalBody

customLabels.label: Updates all Administrative Account records to use the format in Administrative Account Name Format.</br></br>Warning: Before proceeding, learn about the impact of this setting. Also disable processes that reference Administrative Accounts.
customLabels.name: stgRefreshAdminAcctNameDesc

customLabels.label: Refreshes all Administrative Account records to use the format in Administrative Account Name Format. Before proceeding, make sure you've disabled any processes that reference Administrative Accounts.
customLabels.name: stgRefreshAdminNamesModalBody

customLabels.label: We're updating Administrative Account names. Look for an email when the job is done.
customLabels.name: stgRefreshAdminNamesSuccessToast

customLabels.label: Updates all Household Account records to use the format in Household Account Name Format. Also enables Automatically Rename Household Accounts, even if previously disabled. </br></br> Warning: Before proceeding, learn about the impact of this setting. Also disable processes that reference Household Accounts.
customLabels.name: stgRefreshHHAcctNameDesc

customLabels.label: Updating refreshes all Household Account records to use the format in Household Account Name Format. Before proceeding, make sure you've disabled any processes that reference Household Accounts.
customLabels.name: stgRefreshHouseholdNamesModalBody

customLabels.label: We're updating Household Account names. Look for an email when the job is done.
customLabels.name: stgRefreshHouseholdNamesSuccessToast

customLabels.label: Update Preferred Email and Phone fields for all Contacts.
customLabels.name: stgRunCleanUpA11y

customLabels.label: Updates Preferred Email and Preferred Phone for all Contacts based on your org's related settings. It's a good idea to run this job when you enable Require Preferred Email or Require Preferred Phone for the first time or if you haven't enforced them for a while.
customLabels.name: stgRunCleanUpEnableFirstTime

customLabels.label: Update Address Records for Simple Changes
customLabels.name: stgSimpleAddressChangeUpdate

customLabels.label: The Administrative Account naming refresh was queued successfully. An email will be sent at the completion of the batch.
customLabels.name: stgSuccessAdminAccountNameRefresh

customLabels.label: The Household Account naming refresh was queued successfully. An email will be sent at the completion of the batch.
customLabels.name: stgSuccessHHAccountNameRefresh

customLabels.label: We can't save the Course Offering Schedule because its End Time doesn't match the End Time of its associated Time Block. Either edit the End Time, specify a different Time Block, or don't specify a Time Block.
customLabels.name: timeBlockEndTimeMismatch

customLabels.label: We can't save the Course Offering Schedule because its Start Time doesn't match the Start Time of its associated Time Block. Either edit the Start Time, specify a different Time Block, or don't specify a Time Block.
customLabels.name: timeBlockStartTimeMismatch
